participant_1.background:
I want to protect my family from harm.
i cannot choose between lollipops and rainbows.
my favorite show is scooby doo.
my only friend is a dog.
I am a professional who is able to maintain a professional appearance while wearing purple.

participant_2.background:
I would not be able to drive if I were blind.
my mom is my favorite person of all people.
My biggest fear is that my dogs will run off and get lost.
I loved spending hours in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
I am still trying to lose weight.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing today?
I'm doing good, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time in the woods, making up stories and worlds.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read books, especially fantasy novels.
Me too! I love getting lost in a good book. What's your favorite book?
It's hard to choose just one, but I'd have to say The Lord of the Rings.
That's a great choice! I love that series too. What's your favorite part of the book?
I love all the different characters and their stories. It's so well-written and immersive.
I agree! I also love the world that Tolkien created. It's so detailed and believable.
Yeah, it's really amazing. I'm glad you like it too!
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who shares my love of fantasy novels.
Likewise! I'm always looking for new people to talk to about books.
Me too! We should talk more sometime.
That sounds great! I'd love to.
